location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省长沙市
location.en: Changsha, Hunan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的综合性全国重点大学，办学起源于公元976年创建的岳麓书院。为双一流、985工程重点建设大学。
description.en: A comprehensive national key university directly under the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China. Its history dates back to the Yuelu Academy, founded in 976 AD. It is a Double First-Class University and a Project 985 key construction university.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省长沙市岳麓山
location.en: Yuelu Mountain, Changsha, Hunan, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中国古代四大书院之一，是湖南大学的办学起源和前身，至今仍在办学。
description.en: One of the four great academies of ancient China, it is the origin and predecessor of Hunan University and continues to operate today.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年于长沙创办的学堂，是湖南大学的前身之一。
description.en: A school founded in Changsha during the late Qing Dynasty, one of the predecessors of Hunan University.

nodes.id: 湖南公立工业专门学校

zh-cn: 湖南公立工业专门学校

description.zh-cn: 民国时期的一所学校，1926年与其它学校合并组建湖南大学。
description.en: A school during the Republic of China era, which merged with other schools in 1926 to form Hunan University.

nodes.id: 湖南公立商业专门学校

zh-cn: 湖南公立商业专门学校

description.zh-cn: 民国时期的一所学校，1926年与其它学校合并组建湖南大学。
description.en: A school during the Republic of China era, which merged with other schools in 1926 to form Hunan University.

nodes.id: 湖南公立法政专门学校

zh-cn: 湖南公立法政专门学校
en: Hunan Public Law and Politics Specialized School

description.zh-cn: 民国时期的一所学校，1926年与其它学校合并组建湖南大学。
description.en: A school during the Republic of China era, which merged with other schools in 1926 to form Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 1953年中华人民共和国进行的高等院校院系调整运动，期间湖南大学被撤销，其院系被拆分并入多所其他高校。
description.en: The reorganization movement of higher education institutions in the People's Republic of China in 1953, during which Hunan University was dissolved and its departments were split and merged into several other universities.

en: Central South Institute of Civil Engineering and Architecture

description.zh-cn: 1953年院系调整时，在原湖南大学校址上，由湖南大学土木系等合并组建的学院。后发展成为新的湖南大学。
description.en: An institute formed in 1953 on the original site of Hunan University by merging its civil engineering department and others during the national reorganization of higher education. It later developed into the new Hunan University.

en: Hunan College of Finance and Economics

description.zh-cn: 一所财经类高等院校，于2000年并入湖南大学。
description.en: A higher education institution specializing in finance and economics, which was merged into Hunan University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 1960年由湖南大学部分系科分出成立的学院。
description.en: A university established in 1960 from several departments of Hunan University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。湖南大学为其直属高校。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work. Hunan University is directly affiliated with it.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任湖南大学党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，现任湖南大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, currently serving as the President of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义哲学家、教育家，中国共产党创始人之一。新中国成立后曾任湖南大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese Marxist philosopher, educator, and one of the founders of the Communist Party of China. He served as the President of Hunan University after the founding of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。曾为湖南大学题写校名。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist, the main founder and leader of the People's Republic of China. He wrote the calligraphy for Hunan University's name.

description.zh-cn: 北宋时期潭州太守，于公元976年正式建立岳麓书院。
description.en: The prefect of Tanzhou during the Northern Song Dynasty, who officially established Yuelu Academy in 976 AD.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家，倡议筹办湖南大学。
description.en: A Chinese educator who advocated for the establishment of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾任湖南大学校长、教务长。
description.en: A Chinese economist who served as President and Dean of Academic Affairs at Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国冶金学家和教育家，三度出任湖南大学校长，并为校歌作词。
description.en: A Chinese metallurgist and educator who served as President of Hunan University three times and wrote the lyrics for its anthem.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30-40年代中国抵抗日本全面侵略的战争。
description.en: The war of resistance fought by China against a full-scale Japanese invasion in the 1930s and 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国武汉市的综合性大学。在1953年院系调整中接收了原湖南大学的部分院系师生。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Wuhan, China. It received some departments and faculty from the former Hunan University during the 1953 reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国长沙市的综合性大学。其前身中南矿冶学院在1953年院系调整中接收了原湖南大学的矿冶系师生。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Changsha, China. Its predecessor, Central South Institute of Mining and Metallurgy, received the mining and metallurgy department from the former Hunan University during the 1953 reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广州市的理工科大学。其前身华南工学院在1953年院系调整中接收了原湖南大学的部分院系师生。
description.en: An engineering-focused university in Guangzhou, China. Its predecessor, South China Institute of Technology, received some departments from the former Hunan University during the 1953 reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 曾任湖南公立工业专门学校校长，撰写了“实事求是”匾额。
description.en: Served as the principal of Hunan Public Industrial Specialized School and wrote the 'Seeking Truth from Facts' plaque.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代音乐教育家和作曲家，为湖南大学校歌谱曲。
description.en: A modern Chinese music educator and composer who composed the music for Hunan University's anthem.

description.zh-cn: 中国第一代建筑师，曾任湖南大学副校长，并为学校设计了多座近代建筑。
description.en: One of China's first-generation architects, he served as Vice President of Hunan University and designed several modern buildings for the campus.

description.zh-cn: 中国工程院院士，毕业于湖南大学土木系，曾任湖南大学副校长。
description.en: An academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, graduated from the Department of Civil Engineering at Hunan University, and formerly served as Vice President of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 中国金融家，曾任中国证券监督管理委员会主席，毕业于原湖南财经学院。
description.en: A Chinese financier who formerly served as Chairman of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, graduated from the former Hunan College of Finance and Economics.

description.zh-cn: 中国前政治人物，曾任中共中央办公厅主任等职，在湖南大学工商管理学院获得在职硕士学位。
description.en: A former Chinese politician who served as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee, obtained an in-service master's degree from the College of Business Administration at Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 湖南大学的办学起源于岳麓书院，继承了其院产和办学传统。岳麓书院于1903年改制并与湖南高等学堂合并，成为湖南大学的直接前身。
description.en: Hunan University originated from Yuelu Academy, inheriting its property and educational traditions. In 1903, Yuelu Academy was reorganized and merged with Hunan Higher School, becoming a direct predecessor of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 时务学堂是湖南大学的办学起源之一，后改制并最终汇入湖南大学的发展历程。
description.en: Shiwu School is one of the origins of Hunan University, later being reorganized and eventually merging into the developmental history of Hunan University.

relationships.source: 湖南公立工业专门学校

description.zh-cn: 1926年，湖南公立工业专门学校与湖南公立商业专门学校、湖南公立法政专门学校合并，正式成立省立湖南大学。
description.en: In 1926, Hunan Public Industrial Specialized School merged with Hunan Public Commercial Specialized School and Hunan Public Law and Politics Specialized School to officially establish Provincial Hunan University.

relationships.source: 湖南公立商业专门学校

description.zh-cn: 1926年，湖南公立商业专门学校与湖南公立工业专门学校、湖南公立法政专门学校合并，正式成立省立湖南大学。
description.en: In 1926, Hunan Public Commercial Specialized School merged with Hunan Public Industrial Specialized School and Hunan Public Law and Politics Specialized School to officially establish Provincial Hunan University.

relationships.source: 湖南公立法政专门学校

description.zh-cn: 1926年，湖南公立法政专门学校与湖南公立工业专门学校、湖南公立商业专门学校合并，正式成立省立湖南大学。
description.en: In 1926, Hunan Public Law and Politics Specialized School merged with Hunan Public Industrial Specialized School and Hunan Public Commercial Specialized School to officially establish Provincial Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，湖南财经学院并入湖南大学，增强了其文科尤其是经济学科的力量。
description.en: In 2000, Hunan College of Finance and Economics was merged into Hunan University, strengthening its liberal arts, especially its economics disciplines.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 湖南大学是中华人民共和国教育部直属大学。
description.en: Hunan University is a university directly affiliated with the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 公元976年，时任潭州太守的朱洞正式建立岳麓书院。
description.en: In 976 AD, Zhu Dong, then the prefect of Tanzhou, officially established Yuelu Academy.

description.zh-cn: 杨昌济于1917年向湖南省政府呈文，倡议筹办湖南大学。
description.en: In 1917, Yang Changji submitted a proposal to the Hunan provincial government, advocating for the establishment of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 在1953年全国高等学校院系调整中，国立湖南大学被撤消，其院系被拆分并入多所其他高校。
description.en: During the 1953 national reorganization of higher education institutions, National Hunan University was dissolved, and its departments were split up and merged into several other universities.

description.zh-cn: 1953年院系调整时，湖南大学的土木系等师生被调入新成立的中南土木建筑学院，该学院在原湖南大学校址上建立。
description.en: During the 1953 reorganization, the faculty and students of Hunan University's Civil Engineering Department were transferred to the newly established Central South Institute of Civil Engineering and Architecture, which was founded on the original site of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 在1953年全国院系调整中，原湖南大学的数学、物理、化学、生物、中文、历史、经济等系的部分师生调往武汉大学。
description.en: During the 1953 national reorganization, some faculty and students from the former Hunan University's departments of Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Chinese, History, and Economics were transferred to Wuhan University.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，原湖南大学的矿冶系和矿冶研究所师生调往中南矿冶学院（今中南大学）。
description.en: In 1952, the faculty and students of the former Hunan University's Department of Mining and Metallurgy and its research institute were transferred to the Central South Institute of Mining and Metallurgy (now Central South University).

description.zh-cn: 在1952-1953年的院系调整中，原湖南大学的化工系、土木结构组、电机组等师生调往华南工学院（今华南理工大学）。
description.en: During the 1952-1953 reorganization, faculty and students from the former Hunan University's Chemical Engineering Department, Civil Structure Group, and Electrical Machinery Group were transferred to the South China Institute of Technology (now South China University of Technology).

description.zh-cn: 1960年，湖南大学的铁道建筑、桥梁与隧道、铁道运输三个系分离出去，成立了长沙铁道学院。
description.en: In 1960, three departments of Hunan University—Railway Construction, Bridge and Tunnel, and Railway Transportation—were spun off to establish Changsha Railway University.

description.zh-cn: 1938年，因日军逼近湖南，湖南大学被迫从长沙西迁至辰溪，校园也遭到日军飞机轰炸。
description.en: In 1938, due to the advancing Japanese army in Hunan, Hunan University was forced to relocate westward from Changsha to Chenxi, and its campus was bombed by Japanese aircraft.

description.zh-cn: 新中国成立后，毛泽东为湖南大学题写校名。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, Mao Zedong wrote the calligraphy for the name of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 有学者认为，毛泽东曾寄居于岳麓书院，书院内悬挂的“实事求是”匾对其思想产生了影响。
description.en: Some scholars believe that Mao Zedong's stay at Yuelu Academy and the 'Seeking Truth from Facts' plaque displayed there influenced his ideology.

description.zh-cn: 新中国成立后，中共一大代表、教育家李达就任湖南大学校长。
description.en: After the founding of the PRC, Li Da, a delegate to the First National Congress of the CPC and an educator, became the president of Hunan University.

description.zh-cn: 三度出任湖南大学校长。
description.en: Served as the president of Hunan University three times.

description.zh-cn: 在任校长期间，向国民政府教育部申请改省立为国立，并于1937年获批。
description.en: During his presidency, he applied to the Ministry of Education of the Nationalist Government to change the university's status from provincial to national, which was approved in 1937.

description.zh-cn: 为湖南大学校歌作词。
description.en: Wrote the lyrics for the Hunan University anthem.

description.zh-cn: 为湖南大学校歌谱曲。
description.en: Composed the music for the Hunan University anthem.

description.zh-cn: 为湖南大学设计了多座近代建筑，如老图书馆、大礼堂等。
description.en: Designed several modern buildings for Hunan University, such as the Old Library and the Grand Hall.

position.en: Lecturer in the Civil Engineering Department

description.zh-cn: 曾任湖南大学土木系讲师，并为学校设计建筑。
description.en: Served as a lecturer in the Civil Engineering Department at Hunan University and designed buildings for the campus.
